testCase.name: Login with Invalid Credentials
testCase.testScenario: User attempts to log in with invalid credentials.
testCase.expectedResult: User sees an error message indicating invalid credentials.

testCase.name: Search for Non-Existent Product
testCase.testScenario: User searches for a product that does not exist.

steps.step: Enter a non-existent product name in the search bar.

testCase.expectedResult: User sees a message indicating no products found.

testCase.name: Add Out of Stock Product to Cart
testCase.testScenario: User attempts to add an out-of-stock product to the cart.

steps.step: Attempt to add the product to the cart.

testCase.expectedResult: User sees a message indicating the product is out of stock.

testCase.name: Checkout with Empty Cart
testCase.testScenario: User attempts to proceed to checkout with an empty cart.
testCase.expectedResult: User sees a message indicating the cart is empty.

testCase.name: Apply Expired Discount Coupon
testCase.preRequisite: User is on the checkout page.
testCase.testScenario: User applies an expired discount coupon.

steps.step: Enter an expired discount coupon code.

testCase.expectedResult: User sees a message indicating the coupon is expired.
